languages.text: "Вы получите своих астропатов. Династия фон Валанциус слишком важна, чтобы мы закрывали глаза на постигшие ее трудности".
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."
languages.original_text: "Вы получите своих астропатов. Династия фон Валанциус слишком важна, чтобы мы закрывали глаза на постигшие ее трудности".

traits.locale_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to them in the time of need."
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to them in the time of need."
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."
"You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

languages.text: “我们会为你找到你需要的星语者。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝实在是太重要了，既然你的王朝需要帮助，我们绝不会坐视不理。”
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

traits.locale_text: “我们会为你找到你需要的星语者。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝实在是太重要了，既然你的王朝需要帮助，我们绝不会坐视不理。”

languages.text: «Tendrá sus Astrópatas. La dinastía von Valancius es demasiado importante para que hagamos la vista gorda en un momento de necesidad».
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

traits.locale_text: «Tendrá sus Astrópatas. La dinastía von Valancius es demasiado importante para que hagamos la vista gorda en un momento de necesidad».

languages.text: 「感応通信官を手に入れることになるだろう。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は、必要な時に見て見ぬふりなどできないほど重要な王朝だ」
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

traits.locale_text: 「感応通信官を手に入れることになるだろう。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は、必要な時に見て見ぬふりなどできないほど重要な王朝だ」

languages.text: « Et vous aurez vos astropathes. La dynastie von Valancius est trop importante pour que nous l'ignorions quand elle a besoin de nous. »
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous aurez vos astropathes. La dynastie von Valancius est trop importante pour que nous l'ignorions quand elle a besoin de nous. »

languages.text: "Ihr werdet Eure Astropathen bekommen. Die Dynastie derer von Valancius ist für uns zu wichtig, um einfach die Augen zu verschließen, wenn sie in Not ist."
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet Eure Astropathen bekommen. Die Dynastie derer von Valancius ist für uns zu wichtig, um einfach die Augen zu verschließen, wenn sie in Not ist."

languages.text: "Astropatların hizmetinde olacak. Von Valancius hanedanlığı, ihtiyaç anında görmezden gelemeyeceğimiz kadar önemlidir."
languages.original_text: "You will get your Astropaths. The von Valancius dynasty is too important for us to just turn a blind eye to it in its time of need."
